FuncDef:
The traffic-behavior log command configures the maximum number of flows and the interval for collecting packet statistics recorded by the log first-packet action.
The undo traffic-behavior log command restores the default values.
By default, the maximum number of flows recorded simultaneously is 256, and the interval for collecting packet statistics is 5 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of flows recorded simultaneously.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191, The default value is 256.

Specifies the interval for collecting packet statistics.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 60, in minutes. The default value is 5 minutes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the maximum number of flows and the interval for collecting packet statistics recorded by the log first-packet action.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
